name: Zombiee
description:
story:

A virus developed due to throwing tons of plastic into oceans . This virus outbreak on cities turning human beings into zombies. A powerful, rapidly growing virus threatens to existence of human beings.

Fight for the survival and save the world.It won't be easy to win battle. Upgrade your weapon.

This is an offline game where you can :

 -kill different types of zombie monsters with powerful weapon

 -Upgrade weapons for greater effect

 -new exciting levels

I am a new 3-D game developer and this is my first 3-D horror game. I always want to hear from you, your feedback is motivation for me to create good game and make it better everyday.  

If there are any bugs, report to us.
